title: 혼합 가정법 ②
description: 현재 상황이 달랐다면 과거 결과가 어땔을지. 예) If I were more confident, I would have spoken up in the meeting. 이러한 변형 가정을 사용하여 스토리텔링 연습.
examples: If I were more confident, I would have spoken up in the meeting.
If we had better resources, we would have completed the project earlier.
If the market were more stable, we would have invested more aggressively.
learning_points: 현재 조건이 과거 결과에 미치는 영향을 표현한 혼합 가정법

sentences.kr: 내가 더 자신감이 있었다면, 회의에서 발언했을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If I were more confident, I would have spoken up in the meeting.

sentences.kr: 우리가 더 나은 자원을 가지고 있었다면, 프로젝트를 더 일점 완료했을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If we had better resources, we would have completed the project earlier.

sentences.kr: 시장이 더 안정적이었다면, 더 공격적으로 투자했을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If the market were more stable, we would have invested more aggressively.

sentences.kr: 그가 더 경험이 많았다면, 그 상황을 더 잘 처리했을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If he were more experienced, he would have handled the situation better.

sentences.kr: 기술이 더 발달하였다면, 이런 혜신적인 해결책을 찾지 못했을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If technology were more advanced, we wouldn't have found such innovative solutions.

sentences.kr: 예산이 더 충분했다면, 그 프로젝트를 다르게 접근했을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If the budget were more adequate, we would have approached that project differently.

sentences.kr: 팀이 더 커다면, 모든 업무를 동시에 처리했을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If our team were larger, we would have handled all tasks simultaneously.

sentences.kr: 그 시점에 정보가 더 많었다면, 다른 결정을 내렸을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If we had more information at that time, we would have made a different decision.
